code: export let HomepageOption=/*#__PURE__*/function(HomepageOption){HomepageOption["chart"]="chart";HomepageOption["columns"]="columns";HomepageOption["both"]="both";return HomepageOption;}({});export let FlagType=/*#__PURE__*/function(FlagType){FlagType["new"]="new";FlagType["changed"]="changed";FlagType["default"]="default";return FlagType;}({});export const featuredOnly=items=>items.filter(item=>item.featured);export const nonFeaturedOnly=items=>items.filter(item=>!item.featured);export const groupByQuadrants=items=>items.reduce((quadrants,item)=>({...quadrants,[item.quadrant]:addItemToQuadrant(quadrants[item.quadrant],item)}),{});export const groupByFirstLetter=items=>{const index=items.reduce((letterIndex,item)=>({...letterIndex,[getFirstLetter(item)]:addItemToList(letterIndex[getFirstLetter(item)],item)}),{});return Object.keys(index).sort().map(letter=>({letter,items:index[letter]}));};const addItemToQuadrant=function(){let quadrant=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};let item=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;return{...quadrant,[item.ring]:addItemToRing(quadrant[item.ring],item)};};const addItemToList=function(){let list=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];let item=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;return[...list,item];};const addItemToRing=function(){let ring=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];let item=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;return[...ring,item];};export const getFirstLetter=item=>item.title.substr(0,1).toUpperCase();export const filteredOnly=(items,tags)=>{return items.filter(item=>{const{tags:itemTags}=item;if(typeof itemTags==="undefined"){return false;}if(Array.isArray(tags)){return tags.every(tag=>itemTags.includes(tag));}return itemTags.includes(tags);});};export const getTags=items=>{const tags=items.reduce((acc,item)=>{return!item.tags?acc:acc.concat(item.tags);},[]).sort();return Array.from(new Set(tags));};
